job_description: Manager II, Operations, Ecomm, Business Analyst - Walmart GoLocal - job post Walmart 242,951 reviews 850 Cherry Ave, San Bruno, CA Part-time You must create an Indeed account before continuing to the company website to apply Apply on company site save-icon Job details Job Type Part-time In addition to base salary, Walmart total compensation may also include bonus incentives, stock options, and more. Position Summary... What you'll do... Onboarding Analyst - Walmart GoLocal - Last Mile Delivery Do you enjoy the structure & support of a large organization but crave the autonomy of a small dynamic start up? Do you want to have real career progression & growth in one of the largest Retailers in the world? If so, Walmart Go Local could be the place for you! Walmart GoLocal is a newly launched business line at Walmart that offers highly competitive local commerce solutions to retailers, enterprises and SMBs of all sizes and scale. Our core mission is to transform people's lives by improving proliferation of convenient local commerce services such as local delivery, especially in previously underserved rural and suburban communities. As part of our growth and expansion to continue as one of the Top platforms, we are looking for an Analyst to join the Walmart GoLocal Onboarding team; where you'll have the opportunity to work with our cross functional partners to help onboard customers onto our Delivery platform; showcasing the best of Walmart's values of providing excellent customer service. What you'll do: Manage various onboarding workflows like discovery, integration, & launch and workstreams related to onboarding new clients Manage the delivery of different functions of the E2E Onboarding for various customers within the delivery lifecycle Gather customer requirements and translate them into technical specifications for cross-functional partners Provide timely response and resolution to support daily operations such as set-up changes and error investigation Provide timely and accurate response to client and cross functional team questions or concerns regarding upcoming launches Develop and maintain documentation of client engagements and solution-designs Identify and track open items, provide timely status update to team and management Serve as a subject matter expert for various process and system enhancement projects Cross-functional Leadership: Identify knowledge gaps and lead efforts to define and practice scalable process across all cross-functional partners Partner with Engineering, Product and other teams on for critical initiates and tasks on assigned accounts. You'll Succeed if: You have a proven track record of delivering within medium to large scale technical onboarding/implementation projects/programs 2+ years of experience translating technical concepts to business solutions. POS implementation experience is a plus You have experience with working with clients, third parties, and/or vendors with a focus of delivering excellent customer service You have excellent written and verbal communication skills You have experience in project and/or program management Experience in enterprise software, management or IT consulting, project management, customer management, market research, or similar experience. Familiarity with integration technologies like APIs, REST etc is a plus You're passionate about the customer, the service we offer and our joint success #WalmartGoLocalJob #WGLJob At Walmart, we offer competitive pay as well as performance-based incentive awards and other great benefits for a happier mind, body, and wallet. Health benefits include medical, vision and dental coverage. Financial benefits include 401(k), stock purchase and company-paid life insurance. Paid time off benefits include PTO (including sick leave), parental leave, family care leave, bereavement, jury duty, and voting. Other benefits include short-term and long-term disability, company discounts, Military Leave Pay, adoption and surrogacy expense reimbursement, and more. You will also receive PTO and/or PPTO that can be used for vacation, sick leave, holidays, or other purposes. The amount you receive depends on your job classification and length of employment. It will meet or exceed the requirements of paid sick leave laws, where applicable. For information about PTO, see https://one.walmart.com/notices . Live Better U is a Walmart-paid education benefit program for full-time and part-time associates in Walmart and Sam's Club facilities. Programs range from high school completion to bachelor's degrees, including English Language Learning and short-form certificates. Tuition, books, and fees are completely paid for by Walmart. Eligibility requirements apply to some benefits and may depend on your job classification and length of employment. Benefits are subject to change and may be subject to a specific plan or program terms. For information about benefits and eligibility, see One.Walmart at https://bit.ly/3iOOb1J . Additional compensation includes annual or quarterly performance incentives. Additional compensation for certain positions may also include: Regional Pay Zone (RPZ) (based on location) Stock equity incentives Minimum Qualifications... Outlined below are the required minimum qualifications for this position. If none are listed, there are no minimum qualifications. Minimum Qualifications: Bachelor's degree in Business Administration, Engineering, Operations , or related field and 2 years' experience in operations, project management, or related area OR 4 years' experience in operations, project management, or related area. Preferred Qualifications... Outlined below are the optional preferred qualifications for this position. If none are listed, there are no preferred qualifications. Supervising Associates Masters: Economics Project Management - Project Management Professional - Certification Primary Location... 850 Cherry Avenue, San Bruno, CA 94066-3031, United States of America

Sales Strategy Analyst (Manager II, Business Analysis and Insights, eComm) - Walmart Connect - job post Walmart 242,951 reviews 850 Cherry Ave, San Bruno, CA $97,500 - $162,500 a year -  Part-time You must create an Indeed account before continuing to the company website to apply Apply on company site save-icon Job details Salary $97,500 - $162,500 a year Job Type Part-time In addition to base salary, Walmart total compensation may also include bonus incentives, stock options, and more. Position Summary... What you'll do... Walmart Connect is looking for a Sales Strategy Analyst who can partner with various cross-functional teams to align on cohesive sales strategy that integrates all products and offerings into the Walmart Connect omni channel portfolio to attain annual targets. This includes partnering closely with Product on the product roadmap, identifying opportunities for improvement on existing in-market sales activities, collaborating with Insights & Analytics team to better understand macro sales trends to inform monetization strategies - product mix, operational inefficiencies and consulting with Yield on inventory trends and valuation. The ideal candidate will have strong understanding of the media industry, agency landscape as well as the ad tech side of the ecosystem. This is a highly analytical, cross-functional, and operationally focused role. This role will report to the Sales Strategy Lead and partner closely with counterparts within the broader WMG organization (Product, Ad Ops, Insights & Analytics and Marketing). Responsibilities: Manage Joint Business Partnership (JBP) approval process, review JBP terms to ensure feasibility and exceptions are approved, and partner with Sales throughout the negotiation process. Track and provide weekly JBP status update to VP of Sales Perform ad-hoc analysis and provide recommendation to solve business issue Define alphas/betas GTM approach for Sales based on Joint Business Partnership investment levels. Identify, scope and drive critical projects and initiatives that help drive revenue in a scalable manner. Support management in strategic, operational planning and ensure decisions align overall WMG sales approach and goals. Support development of annual seasonal strategy w/ WMG Integrated Planning and Yield. Support development of any new integrated marketing and content offerings that are aligned with our overall GTM strategy and existing JBP strategy. Determine the appropriate GTM strategy and operational integration of new products, content experiences or marketing initiatives. Partner with WMG Integrated Planning and WMG brand activation team to develop necessary narratives around key sales initiatives such as our seasonal and annual joint business planning (JBP) strategy. Qualifications: BA/BS or equivalent 4-year degree required 4+ years work experience in media industry in sales strategy, sales solutions, sales enablement, planning, ad operations, sales operations, or strategy. Strong knowledge of media research, trafficking, tracking and reporting processes, techniques and technologies Experience with data driven marketing (e.g. with a data management platform) is a plus Experience developing or overseeing quantitative analysis and delivering actionable insights Strong analytic and quantitative skills, that enable you to use data to develop, validate and measure multi-channel campaigns Has strong communication/interpersonal skills and is able to build relationships and influence cross-functionally Can operate in complex environments High level of accountability; proven ability to take ownership and solve problems Experienced in developing long-term media strategies based on data insights Ambitious self-starter mentality and entrepreneurial spirit with a strong drive for excellence and delivery of results About Walmart Connect At Walmart, we enable the connection between supplier brands and retail shoppers at unprecedented scale. As primary stewards of our brand promise, "Save Money. Live Better," we work alongside some of the most talented people in the world to engage with the more than 150M households who shop with us. This is a unique opportunity to join a small, high-visibility team within the largest company in the world. We believe all digital advertising can be targeted and accountable - and we have Walmart's sales data to prove it. Benefits & Perks: Beyond competitive pay, you can receive incentive awards for your performance. Other great perks include 401(k) match, stock purchase plan, paid maternity and parental leave, PTO, multiple health plans, and much more. Equal Opportunity Employer Walmart, Inc. is an Equal Opportunity Employer - By Choice. We believe we are best equipped to help our associates, customers, and the communities we serve live better when we really know them. That means understanding, respecting, and valuing diversity- unique styles, experiences, identities, ideas and opinions - while being inclusive of all people. Who We Are Join Walmart and your work could help over 275 million global customers live better every week. Yes, we are the Fortune #1 company. But you'll quickly find we're a company who wants you to feel comfortable bringing your whole self to work. A career at Walmart is where the world's most complex challenges meet a kinder way of life. Our mission spreads far beyond the walls of our stores. Join us and you'll discover why we are a world leader in diversity and inclusion, sustainability, and community involvement. From day one, you'll be empowered and equipped to do the best work of your life. careers.walmart.com At Walmart, we offer competitive pay as well as performance-based incentive awards and other great benefits for a happier mind, body, and wallet. Health benefits include medical, vision and dental coverage. Financial benefits include 401(k), stock purchase and company-paid life insurance. Paid time off benefits include PTO (including sick leave), parental leave, family care leave, bereavement, jury duty, and voting. Other benefits include short-term and long-term disability, company discounts, Military Leave Pay, adoption and surrogacy expense reimbursement, and more. You will also receive PTO and/or PPTO that can be used for vacation, sick leave, holidays, or other purposes. The amount you receive depends on your job classification and length of employment. It will meet or exceed the requirements of paid sick leave laws, where applicable. For information about PTO, see https://one.walmart.com/notices . Live Better U is a Walmart-paid education benefit program for full-time and part-time associates in Walmart and Sam's Club facilities. Programs range from high school completion to bachelor's degrees, including English Language Learning and short-form certificates. Tuition, books, and fees are completely paid for by Walmart. Eligibility requirements apply to some benefits and may depend on your job classification and length of employment. Benefits are subject to change and may be subject to a specific plan or program terms. For information about benefits and eligibility, see One.Walmart at https://bit.ly/3iOOb1J . The annual salary range for this position is $97,500.00-$162,500.00 Additional compensation includes annual or quarterly performance incentives. Additional compensation for certain positions may also include: Regional Pay Zone (RPZ) (based on location) Stock equity incentives Minimum Qualifications... Minimum Qualifications Bachelor's degree in Business, Analytics, Statistics, or related field and 2 years' experience in data analytics, project management, business, or related area OR 4 years' experience in data analytics, project management, business, or related area. Preferred Qualifications... Outlined below are the optional preferred qualifications for this position. If none are listed, there are no preferred qualifications. Statistical Programming Language Masters: Analytics, Masters: Business Project Management - Project Management Professional - Certification, Six Sigma - Certification Primary Location... 850 Cherry Avenue, San Bruno, CA 94066-3031, United States of America
